text: Jonah Ray Rodrigues (born August 3, 1982) is an American actor, comedian and writer. He plays Jonah Heston in Mystery Science Theater 3000. He is a former host of The Nerdist Podcast and was the co-host of Comedy Central's The Meltdown with Jonah and Kumail.. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Hawaii Category:Actors from Hawaii Category:Writers from Hawaii Category:Podcasters
title: Jonah Ray
